LanguageData.SettingFlagInventoryWeaponsToolTip: If enabled, weapons dropped from non-player pawn inventories (e.g. combat suppliers) will be marked as 'scavenged'.
LanguageData.SettingScavengeSellMultFactorToolTip: When a weapon gets marked as 'scavenged', their sell price multiplier is multiplied by this value.\n\nRequires restart to take effect.
